name: om
description: Om is a CLI tool for scaffolding out projects
readme:
% root

PHASE I
------------------------------------------------------------------
om <website> creates
- assets
  - js
    - vendor
      - zepto
      - require
      - underscore
    - libs
      - helpers
      - views
      - models
      - collections
      - modules
    - main.js
    - app.js
  - css
    - mixins.scss
    - creative.scss
    - grid.scss
    - main.scss
  - img
index.html
styleguide.html

PHASE II
------------------------------------------------------------------
om <website> creates
PHASE I + grunt + mocha + bower

Gruntfile.js
package.json
- tests
- dist

PHASE III
------------------------------------------------------------------
om <addjs> adds specific modules/helpers (om, analytics)
 
PHASE IV
------------------------------------------------------------------
om <website:language> creates
PHASE I specific to project structure
